caption.center: STATE of Utah, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. Danny RIVERA,

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Prior Report: 871 P.2d 1023.
The petition for Writ of Certiorari is granted.
The Court of Appeals opinion is vacated, and the case is remanded for reconsideration. State v. Montoya, 887 P.2d 857 (1994).
/s/ Michael D. Zimmerman
Michael D. Zimmerman
Chief Justice
